price: هماغه چې الله رټلى او ده ويلي دي چې ستا له بندګانو به حتماً يوه ټاكلې برخه ترلاسه كوم.
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
